title: The Quiet Terror of 'The Last Cruise'
description:
Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear discuss the latest HBO documentary 'The Last Cruise' about the COVID-19 outbreak on the Diamond Princess at the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic.
Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer and Claire McNear
